doc.title: Creepshow
doc.plot: The fourth installment of the classic "Creepshow" series involves our old friend Billy, as he is now a proud employee of Creepshow Comics. Being a writer and artist for the company has taken its toll on Billy, and because of poor quality lately Billy's boss is threatening him with his job. He gives Billy one night to conjure up five shocking yarns for the next issue of Creepshow, or he will be fired. With his job on the line, Billy works late into the night cooking up tales involving a deranged author whose fiction fades into reality, a family whose house literally goes BUMP in the night, high school geeks who take revenge at Prom, a house where history has a way of repeating itself, and an evening with a grandfather and his granddaughter that resolves some issues from beyond the grave...
